31:         def to_s(format = :default)
32:           case format
33:           when :default
34:             __getobj__.to_s
35:           when :two_digit
36:             sprintf("%.2i", self)[-2..-1]
37:           when :four_digit
38:             sprintf("%.4i", self)
39:           else
40:             super
41:           end  
42:         end
